Hi, my name is Anel 

Im a Android Developer who works to build apps. 

Im always trying to learn new things. 

Im always trying to learn new experiences. 

I has the opportunity to collaborated for large companies and developed different applications in different areas. 

I holds a bachelors degree in Computer Science from Instituto Tecnologico de Zacatepec 

I enjoys spending time with friends, meeting new places and people, also loves to travel and some of her favorite hobby is playing guitar and playing video games.
